snippet.title: Bomber Bother - Full Playthrough (Steam)
snippet.description:
This free Steam game is an homage to Hbomberguy's legendary charity stream in support of Mermaids, a UK-based charity and advocacy organization that supports gender diverse & transgender children and teenagers.

Herd beavers into the pit and collect a total of $347,137.30, to win the game!

In Classic difficulty mode, if beavers walk straight towards the hole they'll stop and not fall in! The "trick" is to make sure you steer them towards the hole, but not directly at it: Always mind the angle at which beavers are walking towards the pit!

If you manage to make a beaver walk closely past the hole, it's a good chance to give them a little scare: Usually, they will jump right in!

Bomber Bother (C) Dare Looks

#steam #steamgame #steamgames #lowpoly #lgbtqgame #lgbtq #transrights #charity #charitygames #hbomberguy #mermaidsuk #bomberbother #longplay #n64 #freegame #freesteamgames #freetoplay
